channel.title: Server status page
channel.description: I recently have gotten an upgraded internet service, had to unplug my modem many times, and completely experiment with other components to get it working. My IP is changed, and I can't seem to edit my original ip (68.49.136.7) to my new ip address (68.48.25.118).

item.title: Server status page
item.dc:creator: @Rage-Pk -Rage-Pk
item.description:
@Rage-Pk wrote:

[quote=“Zanzibar, post:6, topic:330409”][quote author=Asante213 link=topic=426790.msg3134528#msg3134528 date=1266799988]
Take off your IP Address as a experienced hacker I know that it shouldn’t be posted in the open.
Also, there are many tutorials on changing your IP Address. If you are running on firefox then it is actually much easier. Pm me for more information on this.
[/quote]

EVERBY 1 DNT YOU NO MOPERSCAP IS WOLRD CLAS HACKAS?
Now how many people on Moparscape are actually ‘expert hackers’.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Server status page
item.dc:creator: @andrew4444 andrew4444
item.description:
@andrew4444 wrote:

Anyone can create a Botnet and Ddos a home network. This isn’t hacking, merely flooding. Real “hacking” would be something like decrypting and sniffing out passwords ect. that’s just minimal “hacking”. I highly doubt one person is anywhere near expert hacker on these forums. Although I may be wrong, that’s just my opinion pretty much.

Read full topic

item.title: Server status page
item.dc:creator: @Zanzibar Zanzibar
item.description:
@Zanzibar wrote:

[quote=“Asante213, post:4, topic:330409”]Take off your IP Address as a experienced hacker I know that it shouldn’t be posted in the open.
Also, there are many tutorials on changing your IP Address. If you are running on firefox then it is actually much easier. Pm me for more information on this. ^_^[/quote]
Now how many people on Moparscape are actually ‘expert hackers’.

Read full topic

item.title: Server status page
item.dc:creator: @andrew4444 andrew4444
item.description:
@andrew4444 wrote:

I understand the risks of putting your IP out in the open, but already thousands of people know it and I have had no major problems except for one Ddos attack which lasted a few minutes. Disregard this, my old IP is back.

Read full topic

item.title: Server status page
item.dc:creator: @Asante213 Asante213
item.description:
@Asante213 wrote:

Take off your IP Address as a experienced hacker I know that it shouldn’t be posted in the open.
Also, there are many tutorials on changing your IP Address. If you are running on firefox then it is actually much easier. Pm me for more information on this.

Read full topic

item.title: Server status page
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Despair Mr. Despair
item.description:
@Mr_Despair wrote:

[quote=“The Chubby Bunny, post:2, topic:330409”]I will now steal your identity.[/quote] You sir, are an idiot.

Andrew it sounds like you want to change your IP, what you need to do is set a static IP.

Read full topic
